name: elbe
description: Utility methods for working with iterables as streams.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run check && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run transpile && npm run web && npm run test-run && npm run doc
scripts.doc: npm run doc-create && npm run doc-coverage
scripts.doc-create: npx typedoc --mode file --name elbe --readme README.md --out docs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeProtected ./*.ts
scripts.doc-coverage: npx nyc --reporter html --report-dir docs/coverage npx mocha --reporter spec dist/node/test
scripts.test: npm run transpile && npm run test-run
scripts.test-run: npx nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text npx mocha --reporter spec dist/node/test
scripts.web: npm run web-babel && npm run web-babelfix && npm run web-browserify && npm run web-minify
scripts.web-browserify: npx browserify dist/web/main.js --standalone Elbe -o dist/elbe.js -g [ babelify --presets [ @babel/env ] ]

author: Andre Wachsmuth
